Posts.Content: minpix wrote: Three weeks ago I had a modified radical mastectomy for invasive lobular carcinoma.  Also had opposite breast removed proactively.  After surgery there were two close margins and one positive margin.  My Harvard trained surgeon does not recommend resection but now my Stanford trained oncologist recommends a second opinion from another surgeon.  I will have aggressive chemo followed by radiation.  I am sick with worry over another surgery and then so apprehensive about a second opinion.  What if second opinion differs and I have to make a choice?  Any experience out there with pros and cons of going in to clean up margins?   Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Dirty Margins and further surgery option minpix Naomi
